channel.title: 《搭建NEPL test network —— 内核编译》的评论

item.title: 作者：wolfg
item.dc:creator: wolfg
item.description: This post was from a temporary task of mine and I didn't do any more research on NEPL.
item.content:encoded: This post was from a temporary task of mine and I didn't do any more research on NEPL.

item.title: 作者：Jiang.AnYou
item.dc:creator: Jiang.AnYou
item.description:
Hi,guy, Glad to see that there are other guys like me are trying to compiling NEPL. I am a postgraduate candidate student, and trying to set up my own test network of NEPL. Glad to see you here.
Jiang.AnYou
item.content:encoded:
Hi,guy,
Glad to see that there are other guys like me are trying to compiling NEPL.
I am a postgraduate candidate student, and trying to set up my own
test network of NEPL.
Glad to see you here.

Jiang.AnYou
